response.overview: The city center is the most represented and recorded place in Vienna. It forms the main image of the city and in a way creates the symbolism of the city. This piece is an attempt to deal with this image, through its surface and base. The aesthetics of history and memory of Austrian culture, set to be detailed through different kind of processes. A variety of strategies of displaying, communicate typical impressions of logics. Some of the photographs are digitally reconstructed using various software. These show pure digital impressions of recorded, software-optimized, representations of images. Only the symbolic aspect of the image is present, it is no longer in the context of the recorded 'reality'. no photo
response.title: snow shields the surface
